EmailTemplate.name: Accreditation renewal reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Selective Licensing Accredited Membership
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
With regards to your selective licence for the above property, our records shows your membership of your landlords association was due for renewal on {!Contact.arcusregserv__Accreditation_Expiry_Date__c}.
A condition of paying the discounted fee for your licence is that you maintain your accredited membership and provide proof of this annually. Please, therefore provide a copy of your membership renewal within the next 7 days.
Housing Enforcement Team Peterborough City Council
